name: XCleaSmart
0:
”Alexa, ask robo cleaner to start cleaning”
”Alexa, ask robo cleaner to stop cleaning”
”Alexa, ask robo cleaner to start charge”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: robo cleaner
des:
To use this skill, click "Enable" above and sign in with your Xclea App account to link your robot. You must create an Xclea account and register your robot in the Xclea App.

Here are some of the phrases you can use for voice commands to control what your vacuum does in your home. Use these to start, stop, pause, locate and send it back to its charging station.

START
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to clean"
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to start cleaning"

STOP
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to stop clean"
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to stop cleaning"

RESUME
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to resume"
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to resume clean"

FIND ROBOT
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to say hi"
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to say hi for me "


SEND BACK TO CHARGING STATION
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to start charge"

CHANGE MODE
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to change to silent"
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to change to balanced"
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to change to turbo"
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to change to Max"
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to switch to silent"
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to switch to balanced"
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to switch to turbo"
• "Alexa, ask robo cleaner to switch to Max"
